everything_is_possible: Fancy Greek or looking for a warm bakery? Extensive dinner or quick snack? Everything is possible!
enter_location: Enter a location and discover eateries & restaurants near you.
avoid_long_queues: Avoid long queues and choose pickup or delivery at a convenient time.
order_as_a_company: Prefer to order as a company or class? Quickly & easily request your group account. Each group member pays individually via app or web.
choose_from_your_menu: Choose from the menu or use your order history and pay easily online, cash or contactless.
no_more_hassle: No more hassle with loyalty cards! Earn rewards effortlessly, as we keep track of all points for you.
show_merchants_with_loyalty: Show only restaurants with a loyalty card.
cookie_description: We use cookies to give you the best experience on our website. More information can be found in the cookie policy.
